Description: Glazed composition shabti of St3-Imn-pw Born of Tasheritiht, with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the string of the incised seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in eight rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
